member.name: T:Lokad.Api.ILokadApi

member.name: T:Lokad.Api.ITimeSerieApi
member.summary: Operations for adding, changing and deleting source data for forecasts

member.name: M:Lokad.Api.ITimeSerieApi.AddSeries(Lokad.Api.Identity,Lokad.Api.SerieInfo[])
member.summary: Adds new series to the current Lokad account.
member.param: The identity that represents account to work with.
member.returns: unique identifiers for the series in matching order

remarks.para: .NET developers can leverage classes that hide the paging and batching complexity.

member.name: M:Lokad.Api.ITimeSerieApi.DeleteSeries(Lokad.Api.Identity,System.Guid[])
member.summary: Deletes the specified series from the current Lokad account.
member.param: The identity that represents the account to work with.
IDs of the series to be deleted.

remarks.para: .NET developers can leverage classes that hide the paging and batching complexity.

The cursor (use for the first page and then for the pages afterwards).

remarks.para: .NET developers can leverage classes that hide the paging and batching complexity.
